<div class="tsdocPage">

<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->



Path to the Doxygen XML input folder relative to the website folder.

## Signature

```typescript
doxygenXmlInputFolderPath: string;
```

## Remarks

Specifies the location of XML files generated by Doxygen, typically containing the parsed documentation data. Path should not include initial or final slashes.
